snippet.title: Robin - Batman: Arkham City
snippet.description:
Find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/batmanarkhamcity

Download the fully playable Robin character add-on for Batman: Arkham City. Robin comes complete with his own unique gadgets and special moves, and is playable in all challenge maps in the game, as well as two additional challenge maps that are included with the pack. The pack also contains a bonus Animated Robin and Red Robin character skins.

Robin Downloadable Content available starting November 22nd, 2011.
